data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
The the princess is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to lure the princess into the bush
data.mid_motivation: I want my pack to kill and eat the princess in the bush where the people will not be able to find her remains easily
data.long_motivation: I need to hide evidence of our activity from the people for as long as possible

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go another part of the bush to hunt
